t.t-value: move_line_ids.filtered(lambda c: c.move_type_id == chicken_type and c.state == 'done' and c.picking_id)
move_line_ids.filtered(lambda c: c.move_type_id == meat_type and c.state == 'done' and c.picking_id)
move_line_ids.filtered(lambda c: c.move_type_id == medicine_type and c.state == 'done' and c.picking_id)
move_line_ids.filtered(lambda c: c.move_type_id == feed_type and c.state == 'done')
move_line_ids.filtered(lambda c: c.move_type_id == feed_type and c.state == 'done' and not c.picking_id)

tr.name: mother
tr.t-foreach: o.move_line_ids.filtered(lambda c: c.state == 'done' and c.product_id.one_day_chicken and c.location_dest_id == o.location_id)

span.t-esc: '{:,}'.format(int(line.qty_done - sum(o.move_line_ids.filtered(lambda c: c.state == 'done' and c.product_id.one_day_chicken and c.location_id == o.location_id and c.lot_id == line.lot_id and c.picking_id).mapped('qty_done')))).replace(',','~').replace('.',',').replace('~','.')

'{0:,.2f}'.format((line.qty_done - sum(o.move_line_ids.filtered(lambda c: c.state == 'done' and c.product_id.one_day_chicken and c.location_id == o.location_id and c.lot_id == line.lot_id and c.picking_id).mapped('qty_done'))) * 100 / o.chick_units).replace(',','~').replace('.',',').replace('~','.')

t.t-value: total_units + units
total_amount + amount
total_kilos + kilos
round(total_amount + amount,2)

t.t-if: feed_move_lines.lot_id and feed_move_lines.lot_id not in lots['lots']

t.t-value: sum(feed_move_lines.filtered(lambda c: c.location_dest_id == o.location_id and c.lot_id == line).mapped('qty_done'))
sum(feed_move_lines.filtered(lambda c: c.location_id == o.location_id and c.lot_id == line and not c.picking_id).mapped('qty_done'))
sum(feed_move_lines.filtered(lambda c: c.location_id == o.location_id and c.lot_id == line and c.picking_id).mapped('qty_done'))
out_qty + dev_qty - entry_qty
sum(feed_move_lines.filtered(lambda c: c.location_dest_id == o.location_id and c.lot_id == line).mapped('amount'))
sum(feed_move_lines.filtered(lambda c: c.location_id == o.location_id and c.lot_id == line and not c.picking_id).mapped('amount'))
sum(feed_move_lines.filtered(lambda c: c.location_id == o.location_id and c.lot_id == line and c.picking_id).mapped('amount'))
round(out_amount + dev_amount - entry_amount,2)
feed_move_lines.filtered(lambda c: c.location_id == o.location_id and c.lot_id == line and not c.picking_id)
total_kilos + dif_qty
round(total_amount + dif_amount,2)

tr.t-foreach: feed_move_lines.filtered(lambda c: c.location_id == o.location_id and c.picking_id)
tr.name: feed_move_lines

t.t-value: total_kilos + kilos
total_amount + amount
total_units + units
total_amount + amount
